articles.title: Report: South-East Asia's eSports industry prefers 'mobile-first' experience - The Star Online
articles.description: Experts say South-East Asia’s eSports industry will grow in a different direction from its US and European counterparts, thanks to its preference for mobile gaming.
articles.content:
As eSports rises to the mainstream in South-East Asia (SEA), both athletes and viewers are likely to experience the sport on their phones, according to a new report.
